intents.comment: I purchased these after previously purchasing a different set of Gildan shirts, which were great. These shirts were inexpensive, so my expectations are possibly unreasonable in this price range. To be honest, they were a bit thinner than I expected. Not overly thin, but somewhere between medium and thin. I don't expect them to last as long as the other shirts I purchased. They are starting to lose their shape after a couple of months of use, while the others from about a year and a half ago are still generally going strong. I'm not a fan of the black text tagless design. Mostly because it is difficult to find black text on a dark-colored shirt. In theory, the front should be how I folded it, and a search unnecessary. However, before coffee, this is more of a challenge than one would expect. I think I would buy a higher thickness shirts instead.

I don’t shop for white shirt's for myself and I usually stick to the basic brands like Hanes when buying them for my son. I haven’t heard of this brand before but couldn’t pass up the deal for 6 shirts. The M fit him perfectly, they feel nice and he was happy with the fit. He prefers these over his other ones now. I wanted to wash them first before the review to see if they shrank or stayed true to size, they stayed true. Very happy with this purchase.

I wear black t-shirts exclusively under my polos everyday. It's just a look that I have grown to like. I also like it when my t-shirt collars keep their shape. The Gildan brand does just that. This is what I was looking for in an under shirt and they delivered. The price is right too. I usually wear a large and that's what I ordered. The fit was just right. I would recommend this product. Have a great day!

I like the price and they seem well made. The cotton material is a bit thinner than I was expecting but it is soft and smooth. My biggest dislike is the neck is too large and loose. I prefer a tighter, close fit t-shirt neck which Gilden has on the heavier long sleeve cotton t-shirts. It could be that I should have ordered medium instead of large. I'm in-between sizes. These are fine and especially if wearing as an undershirt you don't want to show.

Yeah. I have a long Torso and those others short shirts don’t do it. These Gildans do do it for me. Looks/fits nicely. Enough shirt to tuck in if needed which is nice on cold days on the plumb crack. Could fit a little nicer around the shoulders seams, but for the price no compaints. Almost as nice as a custom tee in the $10-$15 for only one range… which long torso’d people need. Dew it!
Perfect fit for me. I am 175lbs, 6ft tall and have wide shoulders which tend to make me debate between medium and large shirt sizes a lot. Medium fit nicely on my shoulders and had good length too.
These are a good basic tee that I'll be wearing under my work uniform. I've purchased from this brand before and I've never had any issues, and I predict that I will be purchasing more in the future.

I love these tees, soft, thin, great for hot weather, long enough to cover the bottom, but doesn't look baggy and sloppy. Definitely ordering more. 2x fits perfect 5'6" 230ibs. And didn't shrink a lot just enough to fit perfectly if you want baggy order up a size.

Medium fits perfect if you're my build. 5'8" / 165 lbs / 40" chest / athletic build. Comfortable, not to tight or lose on my chest. Able to wear a beater underneath comfortably. Length is 10 inches below my belly button as a reference point for me at 5'8".

Just got these shirts and the fit is perfect. I'm 6'1" 175#. T-shirts are usually baggy or too short. These, fit in the shoulders and arms without expecting an extra 10" in the waist or showing off skin when reaching up. I'll update this after a couple washes.

These are some of the BEST Dri-fit shirts you can buy at a great price. This is my 4th order and the only ones I get for my Hubby. He wears them for work and likes how comfortable they are but specifically loves the special Dri-fit wicking that keep him cooler in the Summertime.

Love these undershirts but the fact that they are over 100% more expensive than last buy (about 10 months) makes me beyond frustrated. If inflation hovered around 10%, why are these twice the price and then some. In the future, I will be looking for an alternative undershirt that is fairly priced.

These shirts fit perfectly and hide well as an undershirt. I wear a large t-shirt so I ordered medium and they are perfect for an undershirt. Best part is there is no side seam running down from your underarm which I despise on a t-shirt.

These are my new go to t-shirt. They are light, but not too light and not too thin. Fit perfectly. XL is an XL. They are soft and the most comfortable t-shirt I've ever worn. And 6 for $21? Crazy good deal. I rarely give a 5-star review. For the price and quality these deserve it.
T shirts where great. Im 5'11 180 Xl. I bought XL they are true to fit. Shorts are some what thin, they are made to be a light shirt wore as a undershirt.
Purchased for my husband as he works in construction and goes through so many shirts in the summer. He is tough on them too and these are the only ones we have found that hold up and wash nicely!
Love the fit and product but don't love that I had one come with the collar stitching unraveling straight out of the package.

I have a few Gildan shirts and I must say, they are nicer than the either Hanes or Fruit of the Loom ones I have (it really depends on the shirt "model" but overall I like these Gildan ones better than those)  The XL ones I have are nice, and I wear them under another "work shirt" because TShirts break dress code. And when I take them off at the end of the day, they're not "moist" so the wicking must be doing its job.  The 2XL ones I have fit nicely as well, without another shirt overlapping them.  I have a set of straight black XL Gildan shirts that I use for under my work shirts that are a bit more "crispy" than this set, I don't know if I just need to break them in or wash them a bunch more times; but they have a feeling like the fibers are "tight" whereas this set (multiple colors) are softer and "billowy-er" where you feel like you could move around easier in them.  The dark blue XL I found just now does feel "harder" than the dark blue 2XL, but it's still softer than the black XLs I have - so it might just be a case of needing to work out the fibers and send it through a washer-dryer series a few extra times.
Jason loves his these tagless tees. He even sad they are so soft. Will order him more at a later date.
Definitely wash well, and no shrinkage problems in the dryer. Their fit is spot on, and soft. Definitely a good value.

Forget about the price. Finally a good quality undershirt/T-Shirt that's a good fit for Big & Tall. All 3 of my previous brands changed the way XXL T-Shirts are cut to make them longer. I called and verified 3 manufacturers whom said basically the same thing - they need to make them longer and instead of adding more material they made them smaller around the middle.  Only con is both bottom and sleeve seems tend to curl.
replacing my beloved haines comfort soft after way too long and am very happy with these they are very soft and fit great
My son really like these shirts, very little or no polyester fiber. He sweats a lot and these shirts absords well. He has asked me order another set.

I have several other shirts from this brand and generally like the material, fit, etc. These were perfect the first time I wore them, but shrank a bit in the wash and now are just a bit on the snug side. I would order one size up next time.
Summer light cotton but T-shirt way too long in proportion with the chest width
I am so glad I found Gildan, just hope they never change and keep up the HIGH QUALITY, HIGH COTTON CONTENT and GREAT FIT AND DURABILITY at an Incredible Price!!!

I'm wide in the shoulders and long in the torso with athletic build, sometimes hard to find a shirt that fits these areas well without being too loose or big of a shirt. These fit the bill very well, will certainly buy more.

Finally found t shirts that fit .....go up on size.. E is better as EG in my opionion ..BEST part is not too tight around neck with high( ish) collar and no saggy sleeves.. good enough for casual wear with jeans with out looking SLOPPY A GOOD BUY AT GOOD PRICE will order again

I run a small business and used these for some orders I had recently. And they were really easy to work with and the shipping was super quick and for this brand that price is awesome and especially with different color options to choose from. Would definitely recommend and will most likely be purchasing a lot more.

I don't understand why Amazon doesn't sell a 3X Gildan T-shirt. My wife buys me 3X Gildan T-shirts locally. They shrink when washed in warm water and dried on medium heat, and they fit me great then. I use the shirts to sleep in and too just hang around the house in.

I thought I'd try the t-shirts as the price was so inexpensive. At first I was impressed because the cut and fit of the shirts was very good. However, after the first wash I was less impressed with the quality of the cotton. I wasn't expecting high quality material for the price, but it was not smooth and wrinkled badly coming out of the dryer. I tried using fabric softener and dryer sheets, but it didn't help much. Folding them neatly was a chore. I think that if you go through t-shirts quickly and aren't very concerned about wrinkles, these are a very good buy - just not for me.

The dark blue heather tees are a poly/cotton blend while the black & dusty blue shirts are 100% cotton.  The fabric compositions wouldn't be an issue on their own. The problem is that the two different type fit very differently as well - the poly/cotton shirts fit comfortably and true to size. The cotton shirts are shorter, wider and tighter under the arms.

These were pretty inexpensive shirts, so keep that in mind. The quality isn’t great. They fit well enough, but the seams at the bottom and on the sleeves tend to want to roll up. You can iron it flat, but the next time you wash it, they roll again. Also the stitching on one of the shirts is coming undone. I guess you get what you pay for. I will shop around and be willing to pay more for better quality next time.

This review is based on G2000 and G1100 size small. This size is more like XS. Modern sizes are more like fitted or slim fit. Pros: Price is very fair. Over all quality is very good and form factor is good after a wash. Most box store manor brand (one with the fruit) will shrink significantly and not hold form and look all wrinkled. Shrinkage is 5% after washing in cold and low dry. Might be an issue is you wash in hot or warm with normal dry cycle. Likely to shrink 10%.  Cons: Like many brands today sizing is an issue with smaller sizes; shirt designs in this category is totally inconsistent. Sizing for small tend to run more like fitted or even slim. With Gildan the waist is extremely tight and I felt like a sausage even before washing. Granted I have gained a little weight during Covid but not that much. I washed one just to see the shrinkage if I decide to purchase a size up. Just as a note many of my other brands in small still fit fine. Other review have commented on the sizing issues also.

This package includes 5 t-shirts, 3 are made of one type of fabric, 2 are made of another. I washed them in cold water, tumble dried on low and 3 literally shrunk at least a size to size and a half. Very disappointing fabric quality.
I knew it was 109% cotton but I wanted to wash and dry it to see how much it shrinks. I bought the large size. It shrinks quite a bit.

I’ve worn these shirts probably 3 or 4 times each so far, and the color is staying well. The problem is that the shirts do shrink after washing. Mine got a bit shorter after some semi warm washes and drying on low. If I bought these again, I would go with a tall.
There were imperfections in the stitching, the neckline easily stretches out, and they are actually alittle itchy (especially the solid colors compared to the heathered colors)
Light weight. I'm not expecting the shirt to last to long.
disappointed that they look years old now... with saggy necklines
Collar is strange and fabric is no good
These are nice, but not great. Feels like they shrank a little after the first wash and now seem be better suited for lounging.

When I first got these shirts, I thought they were great. After I washed them, not so much. I followed all the washing instructions, yet these shirts still shrunk considerably. Very disappointed, because I thought so highly of them at first. Pay a little more, and get something else that doesn't shrink.

Shirts fit perfect on first wear, and have slowly become shrinking to a crop top I wouldn’t even wear to bed. Otherwise they were exactly what I had hoped for being lightweight and soft without irritating skin, but yeah that shrinking is bad.  Still looking for an alternative to find a shirt like this I can just throw in the washer (I did not hand wash and that probably had an effect but I also think that’s bogus to be a requirement)

I bought based on the positive reviews, but am disappointed with the purchase. These shrink big time. I bought one size larger (XL) hoping to end up with a large, but it shrunk to a small. Sleeves ended up good for an American Girl doll. So short, I can barely tuck into my pants.Wouldn’t buy again.

These T-shirts are very thin and yes they would show your nipples if the fit was fairly tight. The only problem I have is with the neck opening which is way too large for me and for this reason I will not be purchasing these again. Thanks!

Washed these once and the collar was already folding over. I read a lot of reviews on these shirts and they seemed to be good quality. They are not. I would return everyone of them but will use them as rags instead and chalk it up to a poor decision on my part. I have bought Gildan shirts from stores and these are not the same quality. My bad!!

Bought these for my husband in the beginning of February (it’s now mid March) he already has 2 shirts (the red and a navy) with holes and a black one that the stitching is starting to go. He said these shirts are comfortable, but they do run small per the sizing chart and they are not good quality for the price. He has gotten cheaper and a Kate’s of shirts from Walmart years ago that still don’t have holes. We had high expectations, but are very disappointed.

These shirts look and feel nice but the sleeves make the whole shirt feel cheap. The sleeves are short on the underside near the armpit and make mobility feel awkward. Cheap enough to not care to return them but I wouldn’t buy these again.
Upon arrival shirts seem to be of good quality and size. After one wash they've shrunk and barely fit. Size up if you buy these since they shrink in the dryer.

I had high hopes for the material when I got the delivery. Once I washed it (cold) and dried it (low heat) I was surprised how much they shrank, also the material is not soft at all.. it's on the stiffer side. Not a comfortable tshirt by any means.

Loved the T-shirt’s. They are soft and seemed to be great quality… until I fully inspected the shirt. As you can see in the picture, one is the shirts came with two small perforations. I wish I could return these, but it’s a bit too late.
Shirt material is surprisingly thin and feels cheap / harsh. The t-shirts were nearly see-through. I expected a higher quality item.

The shirts from GILDAN here on Amazon are made in Bangladesh and are of poor quality and workmanship. If you'll notice the green shirt on the right, it was purchased in store at Michael's. It's made in Nicaragua and is by far a better made shirt. Take notice of the prints. Not that, that really make a huge difference but, it is a sign. A big red sign. You can literally see through the shirt it's so thin and the threading at the end of the sleeves and the bottom of the shirts have started unraveling. I wouldn't purchase these again and will continue to buy my plain GILDAN tee's from Michael's instead of Amazon.
Shirts fit weird. The collar rolls up as well as the sleeves. Also they run a bit small

These shirts were entirely too big, wide and long. The shirts are extremely oversized to be a 2x. I definitely will not be ordering anymore from Gildan. I am ver unhappy with my purchase and the next time I purchase T/Shirts I will make sure that I visit a physical store. So disappointed with my purchase from Gildan!!!!

Was excited for these shirts as I need a lot of undershirts to wear. I followed the washing instructions, gentle cold cycle and then tumble dry on low. After the first was and dry these things went from fitting perfectly and the shirt length going below my belt to now they are snug fitting and the length is WELL above my belt. Incredibly disappointed and would not recommend.
I sized up in these shirts in anticipation of shrinking and they shrunk to a size medium from an XL and faded with the first wash and wrinkle easily. Works well as an undershirt though.

They are soft but not what I was looking for. Fit very small so order at least 1 size up, but if you are looking for a t-shirt that is a little more thick and not look like a colored basic t-shirt keep looking.
Was Amazon choice but not nice quality fabric and shrank alot

These shirts are cheap for a good reason as they shrink tremendously after being washed. At first they fit fine, however after that first wash, the bottom will shorten almost up to tne belly button and the arm/shoulder area becomes tight fitting. Just poor quality materials used.
Pretty dissappointed in this product. They fit pretty good at first. Washed them cold, still ok, but stretch out weird. Then they don't fit at all any more.
Shirts are too long and sleeves are too short for an XL

TOO MUCH SHRINKAGE - wow shocked - Gilden's never shrink like these normally I wonder if they are actually Gilden quality got other sizes too and these are all the same they shrink to smaller size ... crazy! Do NOT recommend to buy these, not good quality
After just a few wears and washes, the shirts stretched and are too big. They fit perfectly at first, but it didn't last.
Washed once, now can't wear

I wear very basic clothes and so I was looking for a good quality basic shirt pack to wear everyday. These just don’t fit me all that well and they feel cheap. I would rather spend a bit more and buy next level tshirts.

I usually like to buy t-shirts from a store - where I can actually 'touch and feel' and to see if it is 'too transparent', but I was shopping online and needed some t-shirts. So, for convenience, I ordered these, since the reviews seemed to indicate they were pretty good and the material content is almost identical to what I usually buy. I am a female - but prefer to buy men's t-shirts for casual wear; I always found them to be more comfortable than t-shirts made for women. I also found that men's t's are usually made much more durable than those made for women - and last for years. However, when these came in I was disappointed to see how thin the material felt and how sheer they were. Sheerer than any men's t-shirt that I have ever seen. I also found the shape quite different - compared to most men's t-shirts that I own. I am guessing, however, the thinness may be great for someone wanting to keep cool - so I gave it two stars for that.
I just bought these a few weeks ago and the torso has already shrank up and comes above the belt. Not good quality like they used to be. I will go back to Hanes or Jockey.

I missed the days when companies like Gildan made quality products. I would rather pay extra for an item and have the same quality it used to have. This doesn’t appear to be an option anymore. There are so many new companies that come out making items like this, you never know who to trust so your knee-jerk reaction is to go with the name you recognize as quality. Unfortunately that quality no longer exists. I’ve had two out of the six T-shirts have the stitching fray and come out of the collar area. I’m 59 years old and don’t do heavy “construction“ work around my home so it’s always just light yardwork and these T-shirts can’t hold up to that. And when they come out of the dryer, the collar is all wonky because of the black band that’s sewn in there to give the collar structure, doesn’t expand or contract at the same rate the cotton around it does.

Purchased as undershirts. I wear a large. Full cut is preferable. (I dislike clingy clothing.) Out of the package, these seemed to fit much of that bill, though they did seem thin and a bit short. These then shrank from a skimpy large to a short, skimpy medium - TIGHT - this in spite of drying at extra low temperature. Gilden is a great brand and I wear their regular long sleeve Ts everyday, year round. But these under shirts are cheap and seemingly made with a much shorter and slightly-built bloke in mind.

Ordered them alarm. Got them ordered 2XX and there are way too small. They were like extra large didn’t even cover go down to my pants and I are very tight in the top. going to throw them away not worth trying to send them back for 20 bucks not worth it. Be careful with your order and they’re very light for what I thought they would be most of the shirts Lillian made gilden used to be a good T-shirt. They’re pretty heavy. These are light light light very very disappointed and will not buy this brand ever again so be careful what you order. They run very small. they’re saying on their scale there should be 170 . All the other shirts I buy or 2X and they fit fine. These things are like extra large probably gonna give them to my son-in-law’s or. Throw

Was very disappointed with this purchase I have purchased in past with no problems. The ones I just received I thought were fine but when I got a new T out I found a hole in the back. I was disappointed since I can not return since I had already worn and washed two of the T shirts. I do love these T's but not sure if I will Purchase again because who wants holes.

I can't see how these Tshirts have so many positive reviews...they are absolute GARBAGE!! Each one so far on its FIRST WEAR has garbled up all around the neck! It folds over itself, stretches and does NOT lay flat!! I WANT MY MONEY BACK!!!! AVOID THESE--PAY A LITTLE MORE FOR T-SHIRTS THAT YOU CAN WEAR MORE THAN ONCE!

These shirts arrived worn, dirty, has armpit deodorant stains, and they smell like mildew and body odor. I'd take a picture but I seriously fo not want to touch them again or have them out in my house. I also really do not want to open the bag again because the smell is foul.

I was not expecting cotton but its horrible, I will never buy it again, A total waste of my money. Sometimes you try to save money only to throw it away due to sub par quality, the other reviews I saw, I am not sure they purchased the product.

First/last time buying this brand. Far too small for size indicated, material very thin, and 'free' returns? Nada, this item will cost me 1/3 the cost to return, despite listing indicating it's Prime and free returns. Boo. Hiss. Buy something better, avoid avoid, avoid!

I really don’t like Cliché statements like you get what you pay for but it’s absolutely true when it comes these. I love a good deal but the shirts are not worth the price they are posted at. If they were $10 I wouldn’t complain. The collars get all wrinkled up after you wash them for the first time. I did not like this bacon caller effect. I only like bacon on my breakfast not on my T-shirt

One of the five shirts has been through the wash, and it already has stitching coming out of the seam around the bottom of the shirt. It's bunching up around where the stitching came out. Very disappointed! Hopefully the other four shirts fare better, but so far it's 1:1 failing. I had hoped they would last longer than one wash with all the high ratings.

I hnestly thought these would be better than Fruit of the Loom after reading the reviews. But they are much thinner and just seem like much worse quality overall. I guess I'll keep them, but I will not buy them again. I would honestly go with fruit of the loom. That's just my opinion.
I cannot wear any of these t-shirts after one wash on cold setting. They have all shrunk and. I wait above my belt line. Scratchy cheap quality and shrink horribly. Buyer beware!

I was surprised at how flimsy it felt when I took one out of the package. Just to make sure my mind wasn't playing tricks on me, I weighed it together with an older Hanes and a new Goodfellow shirt I recently bought (all M-size). The two weighed 160 g each while Gildan came in at 138 g. Sent the Gildan back and ordered Fruit of the Loom. Same thing, 138 g. Sent them back as well. It looks like nowdays all these established-name companies mimic each other in their drive to maximize profits by lowering the quality.

The shirt fits on the shoulders/arms but the length of the shirt comes down to the groin. This may be helpful if you are obese, but if you are normal weight, the shirt will be too long and it looks silly.
After one wash these things loose their length and shape. Probably great if you tuck them in but if you wear them out you may not get much wear out of them.

Both the white and the black crew neck shirts shrunk drastically after taking them out of the package and washing before first use. The Medium white shrunk down to Extra Small. The Medium black shrunk down to a Small.

Oddest fitting Tshirt I've ever owned, no thank you, I returned them! Using the great Amazon try before you buy thingy... I got these in excited to have new fresh white undershirts. Wow. they were Larges yet fit in the body like a medium but the length was like a XL TALL. They were long enough to cover my hips. Seriously? Needless to say they were returned...

Had purchased these t-shirts several years ago at a retailer and was satisfied. Was hesitant to order again after reading the negative reviews on Amazon, but reluctantly did anyway. I closely inspected each shirt for flaws and everything was good with the first four, although the material seems to be much thinner than before; however, the last two had the "George" label (Walmart) and were a size larger! You would think a company with $1+ billion in sales could get their act together on quality control and packaging.
This material is not the same as on the seller's website. It's very thin and basic. It's ok to wear it around home

I was happy initially but then this started happening. They lasted a month and then started falling apart. You can probably take the time to fix them. I thought I was buying a good product not a project.

The issue is the shirts are rolled up and a piece of tape is used to hold them in the roll. The tape leaves residue on the shirt, and a line in the shirt where it came off. see pics. when blowing up the pictures, it looks like it also tore the thread where the tape was removed. Also the shirts are not all the same size. they are all labeled the same size, but one or two out of the group were smaller.
Shirts are cheap and look ridiculous. Don't bother. 2xl.made for someone that's 5'6 and 300 lbs not 6'2 and 240

As soon as I opened the package of six I knew they were going to shrink. Very thin material, 100% cotton, no tab inside undershirts with washing instructions. To play it safe, I washed and dried them on the cool setting. But who washes white undershirts that way on a regular basis? Don't bother with these unless you want a really thin shirt and you order up at least one size. I have no idea how much more they would shrink if washed and dried on warm.

This are great, one time. They do not wash well, they do not remain true to size. If you wear a medium buy a small and it may fit after you wash it. Problem is the elastic is poor quality I guess, I don't think I washed it on super hot. Shirts just stretch and never recover. Not Seinfeld's "Golden Boy"
I don’t know how long these will last. There’s multiple spots that have threading coming loose. I’ll keep just for undershirts but no where near quality for wearing alone
I do not recommend these shirts.. Shirts are thinner than expected. Washed them and they're are a wrinkled up mess. Will not buy again.
3 xlarg yah right even my sister kids could not fit them they were so small thier is now way that they were 3 xlarg stay way do not try to get them

I only used one of the six T-shirts to see how it fit after washing it. There was a tiny hole after the first wash. A couple weeks later, it was washed again and there were more holes. A few weeks later, after another wash and if you look at the photo. There are several small holes and one huge hole. Unfortunately, I didn't read the return policy. Which limits the time to 30 days. I went over that amount by 10 days. I have never seen a T-shirt deteriorate so fast. Now, I have to use it as a rag. Don't be attracted to this product by the price. It's definitely not worth 2 cents. I've never given one star before and I hope I never have to again. Buyer beware.

This shirt fits PERFECTLY around my chest, abdomen, and waist. I'm an amateur body builder and it is tight in all the right places to make me look good, except one place, the sleeves. The sleeves on these shirts are unreasonably short and WIDE. This absolutely ruins the whole look of the shirt and makes your arms look like little noodles. These also shrink 1-2 sizes after a couple wash and dry cycles. I do not recommend these unless you want to look like a skinny bitch.

I wanted original Gilden black t shirts. These are trash. You can year them off your chest like the hulk with no strength whats so ever. The sleeves ride into your armpits. I bought large and medium. They're both too small. I'm 5'7 and weigh 175 lbs. Cheap material.
6-pack arrived as a Dirty 4-pack with Holes ? Had Cigarette Burns and smelled like smoke. Awful experience .. returned and will not purchase again.

These t-shirts say they are 100% cotton! However they can not be! I have worked with White cotton my whole life with my sons with my husband and washing them in bleach they come out as most of you will know beautiful these do not! My husband is not a messy man but every time he does anything big spots will appear on these they are garbage! Very very disappointing very! If I could give 0 stars I would! The problem is you only have one month to return them and he seem to wear different T-shirts and then one of these going back and forth,so by the time a month has come and gone it’s too late but they are crap
Bottom line. I take a large. Ordered large. Washed them. Now they arr a small. Seriously? Not happy at all.

Felt like I was wearing one of this skydiving wing suits. Arms had way too much extra fabric and looked ridiculous. I like a lighter fit on the arms but don’t mind loose,… but it was too much. I returned right after I tried it on and even washed hoping it’d shrink a little. It didn’t help.

I have 10-year-old t-shirts that hold up better in the wash. By the 2nd wash the t-shirt is losing color, looks worn out, and the threads around the waist are falling out. Now I need to find the other 4 in the multi-pack and send them back. No way to send just 1 back and get a pro-rated credit. I hate to be wasteful, but something tells me the other 4 will also fall apart when I wear them too.

So the price was right. Hard to complain when it's $2 a shirt. As it turns out, that's about what they're worth. First thing I noticed was that they're short and wide. They're not tapered as suggested in the description and pictures. It's a one-size-fits-all design. That can really be seen in the neck opening. For the Large size that I got, it's a whopping 11.5 inches in diameter. That means for normal men, it will sit low, causing a lot of neck and back to be exposed, and also, the neckline will be really loose. For comparison, my Jockey t-shirts are 8.5 to 10 inches, and a couple that I got at Target (Merona) are 9 inches. To make matters worse, after one wash, the material along the neckline curled badly. An oversized neck opening with a curled rim is NOT a good look. The shirts are simply unwearable in public. So all 6 immediately go into the rag drawer and I'll use them for painting or other messy jobs where it's okay if the shirt gets ruined. No idea why these shirts are getting good reviews.
I have had good luck with this brand however, these have a terrible fit and flare out at the bottom and it looks like you’re pregnant. Completely unwearable.
Cheap quality product Stitching falling apart on the first wash
The shirts fit well when I first tried them on, but they shrunk so much with the first wash they are unusable. Totally worthless.
I like the shirts. I had ordered a 5 Pack and the package was opened along with a shirt missing. If I didn't need one of the shirts right now I definitely would have returned the shirts.
Save your money. Kirkland has the best t-shirts. My mistake for trying to save $.

This is a thin shirt. It is lightweight perfect for summer. I purchased mine larger than needed. With shrinkage they fit perfect. These are not the heavier shirts by the same company that one would use with graphic arts. This is a thin lightweight shirt.

Got a great deal on this set of 5 variety colored t-shirts. Quality and colors all good. You might order one size larger than usual unless you’re going for a generic Baby Gap style. 2 sizes if you have a relationship with beer.
Shrinks after washing and drying

Buy larger than you think you need. These shrink. I got 1 pack and really liked them, then got a second pack before I knew they shrink. Now I have 12 shirts that are just too small. But I liked them enough I got more of the next size up.

The first set I ordered (XL) after washing them 4 shrank to almost a M one was L size and the only one I could wear. The 2nd set was 2XL and drying at medium heat they shrank less and are more of a XL size. The first wash I would tumble dry with no to little heat to keep the size.
Price was right and the product was comfortable.
Fit as expected, nice colours, 2 washes in and still going strong
Was a gift!!! They loved them but wanted a medium!!!!
Nice shirts good quality but they shrink after washing so buy a larger size if you want a looser fit
The shirts lost one size after first wash.
The size runs a little small so order up one size. Otherwise very comfortable and good looking.
Good Material just the smalls are really big I’m gonna put them in the dryer and see if they shrink a little
These we held a tie-dye class at our RV park & these shirts were great! They grabbed the colors & held their shape. We will be doing this again!
They package came opened within a box, they’re not as soft as you think, also I’m a small who ordered large for comfort and they’re still tight on the underarms but that's a personal preference.
The size is good. I like the colors, the material is just a little thinner than I anticipated but satisfactory. Overall I'm satisfied.
A good undershirt! A little see-through but my husband wears them under dress shirts so it doesn’t really matter. Good price for the quantity!
Nice material, soft not scratchy, good buy.
Comfortable, good length and relaxed fit.
The only thing that I didn’t like but was expected is that the shirts shrink pretty quick. Would recommend hang drying!
Can't beat the price even if one is poorly made.
Like my headline says..... this is a t-shirt. Looks like a t-shirt, fits like a t-shirt. The same as any other t-shirt you would buy in a 5 or 6 pack from any store.
You get what you pay for This is decent quality and shipping was same day
There are better and softer Gilda’s shirts out there and I would definitely recommend those over these.
Theses are long shirts to tuck into your pants, the feel is alright,
Great plain tees

Pretty good quality for a gym shirt. Thin enough to breathe, yet absorb perspiration well. However, the black ones sure do collect a lot of lint when laundered. I'm going to try and order more only IF I can get colors other than black.
Get one size up. If you wear Large get Extra Large. They come a little tight.
Good quality and material weight. Fits snuggly in the upper body and loose below as advertised. Great product and can’t beat the price.
I am so glad I found Gildan, just hope they never change and keep up the HIGH QUALITY, HIGH COTTON CONTENT and GREAT FIT AND DURABILITY at an Incredible Price!!!

I'm wide in the shoulders and long in the torso with athletic build, sometimes hard to find a shirt that fits these areas well without being too loose or big of a shirt. These fit the bill very well, will certainly buy more.

Finally found t shirts that fit .....go up on size.. E is better as EG in my opionion ..BEST part is not too tight around neck with high( ish) collar and no saggy sleeves.. good enough for casual wear with jeans with out looking SLOPPY A GOOD BUY AT GOOD PRICE will order again

I run a small business and used these for some orders I had recently. And they were really easy to work with and the shipping was super quick and for this brand that price is awesome and especially with different color options to choose from. Would definitely recommend and will most likely be purchasing a lot more.
Very absorbent , comfortable , nice color Very happy with it .
Just what I was looking for, been wearing whiteys all my life and wife said I need to change it up! Glad I listened to her! Thanks, Love!
I caught these on a sale, but great for the price.
The shirts were as expected and not seconds like others
These t-shirts are sized right, wash up great and are soft.
I can honestly say I love the quality of these Tshirts. I would highly recommend to purchase this item.
I wear these very comfortable T-shirts under my blouses and turtleneck shirts in the winter to add an extra layer of warmth.
Great shirts. Fit good. I will be buying these again.
I give to my son as a gif
Great shirt and a great price
The shirts are exactly as described. They are good quality. Will buy again.
These shirts catch lint like do ones business. Bust they are Comfy easy to clean and true to size. Great for uniforms and workouts
Great fit, they look great and are really comfortable. Awesome price.
It came on time. My son in law is a superintendent construction so he uses a lot of these , the price is great and the fabric is good i have to buy more . I highly recommended
To work in
I buy these for my son several times per year in multiple colors. Great fit, wears well...fantastic price.
True to size
The shirts fit well. I bought them for work purposes.
Never bought short sleeve T shirts online before. Sizing was true and besides having great colors they feel great...will be buying again
They fit and wear well for a cheaper shirt.

I just got these yesterday, so I can't say anything about the durability. Plain T's are my go-to shirt. I bought the XL they look great, feel pretty nice, and fit pretty well. They are snug around the chest shoulders and arms without being skin-tight. They are about 2-3 inches too long, but I have a large chest and broad shoulders with a smaller waist (6ft. tall, 48 inch chest, 34 inch waist) so finding a perfect fit for me is hard. I think the deal is fabulous so I am going to order one more 5pack.

I have bought these 3 times now because these shirts are perfect for me. I wear XL normally and these could not be any more comfortable. Also, $20 for 5 shirts is a serious steal; basically replaced my wardrobe with a bunch of different colors of these
Fits true to size great product
My son absolutely loves these T-shirts
The t-shirts were great fit they looked good and they were very comfortable
Good shirts for the price.
Good product, good price.
Fit perfect and comfortable
I like the shirts. They’re durable through the heat of desert living. Through all the activity and work as well.
Very good buy!!!
I love them
T-shirts fit great.
Worth every cent.
My old set of Gildan shirts were 5 years old, stretched out, and loose. Wanted a fresh new pair to wear outside with rather then using just as bed t-shirts.
Great product
Good shirts
Good quality
Perfect size
Good colrs and feel especially for the price.
Buy a size up than what you would normally buy so your shirt still fits after the first wash.

I bought these to wear to the gym and they are perfect! They are pretty thick and cozy. Some comments say the neck is tighter, which is true, but I found it to be a nice fit because I don't feel sloppy. 10/10 for the price.
Bought these for work. Comfortable.
Used this to make a HTV shirt for a gift. The fit was good and the vinyl stayed. Shirt lookd just fine after washing it.
Good price for 2 shirts! They do shrink a little so maybe order 1 size bigger

The first time I wore these shirts they fit 100% perfect. Exactly how I wanted them to fit.  Then I washed them. And they shrunk. Probably a full size. They’re now too short and too tight and the neck hole is too small. I’m gonna try ordering a size up since they’re cheap but damn am I disappointed.  I ordered the ones with the pocket. I hear rumors they’re different material than the non-pocket ones. So YMMV.

I bought my husband a size large. He wears a medium but I thought some shrinkage might happen. Well after washing it two times it is now wayyy too small. Like it is now is for a size small man. If you buy this size up one or two sizes. I do like the fabric and feel so it’s a potty it shrinks like no other.
Order a size larger. This product shrinks..Nice material.
For a large the tails are to short
I've been wearing men's medium shits for years, slim and reg. These hug you in all the wrong places and make you look frumpy if you have any curves. Super unflattering. Tight neck. Soft material.
Shrinks like crazy the first time through the dryer
I like shirts to tuck in and these do not have length to tuck in.
These shirts fit well but shrunk quite a bit when washed/dried. So much I decided to return them. That seems to be a trend with Amazon Basics clothes
Not bright red like thought

Love the material -- it is soft and sturdy; however, the sizing is a bit off. Large slim is too short. Also, since I like to place a pen in the shirt pocket, it is difficult -- pocket is too small to hold a pen (barely fits).  Otherwise, not a bad shirt for the price...  The three-star rating is for the size and pocket being too small.

Heard this product had a good fit and was comfortable. Fit is perfect, however the material is not breathable and seems to trap heat, so not suited for working out unless it's winter and you are outside.

The shirts were perfect as delivered but after the first wash there was quite a bit of shrinkage. Now the neck is even tight so I'll probably donate these. Other than that the quality was great. Maybe buy a size up?
This was for my son something to chill in the house with. I would order again.
Love the apricot color but they shrunk after being washed a few times. Order a size larger, to allow for shrinkage
